tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent SET (fillfactor = 50)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent RESET (fillfactor)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent SET UNLOGGED
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent SET LOGGED
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: CREATE INDEX parent_index ON parent(a)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent CLUSTER ON parent_index
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: DROP INDEX parent_index
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE child () INHERITS (parent)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE grandchild () INHERITS (child)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ADD COLUMN b serial
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent RENAME COLUMN b TO c
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query:
-- Constraint, no recursion
ALTER TABLE ONLY grandchild ADD CONSTRAINT a_pos CHECK (a > 0)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query:
-- Constraint, with recursion
ALTER TABLE parent ADD CONSTRAINT a_pos CHECK (a > 0)
tests.name: alter_table.sql
alter_table.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE part1 PARTITION OF part FOR VALUES FROM (1) to (100)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE part2 (a int)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE part ATTACH PARTITION part2 FOR VALUES FROM (101) to (200)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE part DETACH PARTITION part2
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: DROP TABLE part2
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE part ADD PRIMARY KEY (a)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ALTER COLUMN a SET NOT NULL
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ALTER COLUMN a DROP NOT NULL
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ALTER COLUMN a SET NOT NULL
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ALTER COLUMN a ADD GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ALTER COLUMN a SET GENERATED BY DEFAULT
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ALTER COLUMN a DROP IDENTITY
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ALTER COLUMN a SET STATISTICS 100
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ALTER COLUMN a SET STORAGE PLAIN
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent NO FORCE ROW LEVEL SECURITY
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent FORCE ROW LEVEL SECURITY
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent DISABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: CREATE STATISTICS parent_stat (dependencies) ON a, c FROM parent
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ALTER COLUMN c TYPE numeric
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE parent ALTER COLUMN c SET DEFAULT 0
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query:
CREATE TABLE tbl (
	a int generated always as (b::int * 2) stored,
	b text
)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE tbl ALTER COLUMN a DROP EXPRESSION
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE tbl ALTER COLUMN b SET COMPRESSION pglz
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: CREATE TYPE comptype AS (r float8)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: CREATE DOMAIN dcomptype AS comptype
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER DOMAIN dcomptype ADD CONSTRAINT c1 check ((value).r > 0)
tests.name: alter_table.sql

tests.query: ALTER TYPE comptype ALTER ATTRIBUTE r TYPE bigint
tests.name: alter_table.sql
